title: The Summer Shoe Trend You’ll Want to Pack for Every Vacation
text: Flip-flops were once reserved for the beach or lounging by the pool. But now, the slip-on-and-go staple has become a bona fide fashion essential, thanks to modern upgrades that make them look chicer than ever. From the latest square-toe details on a classic pair of Havaianas to a studded strap on Balenciaga slides, the latest designs turn the timeless sandal into a style-forward must-have.Even better, today’s flip-flops don’t feel like an afterthought. The new crop is polished enough to wear to a fancy brunch or even a summer wedding. Just ask Kendall Jenner, who’s been spotted wearing sculptural stiletto flip-flops by Alaïa with a celebration-worthy dress in her latest FWRD campaign. Zoë Kravitz has also been a fan, often pairing barely-there thong sandals with loose trousers or oversize shirting in true downtown style star form.Fashion insiders are co-signing the look too. Street style at the Copenhagen and Paris shows revealed a wave of editors styling flip-flops with maxi skirts, tailored vests, and even eveningwear. The effortless contrast delivers the kind of easy-going elegance typically found on the French Riviera.Of course, nothing in fashion is ever entirely “new.” Nostalgic references are fueling the flip-flop revival as well. Carolyn Bessette-Kennedy famously wore them in SoHo in the ’90s, giving the ultra-minimal shoe a polished, off-duty vibe that still resonates. Today’s versions echo that ease—but with a luxury twist.No matter the event on your calendar, flip-flops are the ultimate dependable hero to slip into this summer—and with the right styling, they might just be the chicest choice you make.Discover the best-in-category flip-flops to shop in our curated selection below.Flat Flip-FlopsNothing beats a flip-flop that has withstood the test of time. You can never go wrong with tried-and-true styles by Tkees or a beloved Tory Burch flip-flop.Havaianas Slim Square SandalVeronica Beard Clea Flip-FlopProenza Schouler Cable Thong SandalsTory Burch Kira Padded Flip-FlopTkees Foundations Matte Flip-FlopGucci Minorca Horsebit Rubber Sandal Studded Flip-FlopsThe best micro-trend to try within this category is the studded flip-flop. Whether you gravitate towards grommets or bulbous beads, this flashy take will make your vacation outfits feel festive.Arezzo Sunny Flip-FlopH&M Studded Flip-FlopBalenciaga Cagole Studded Flip-FlopZara Thong Leather SandalsMango Grommet Flip-FlopTory Burch Miller Flip-FlopLeather Flip-FlopsThe easiest way to elevate the humble flip-flop is with quality materials—like the leather straps on these coveted styles.A.Emery Kinto SandalsThe Row Ginza Flip-FlopAncient Greek Sandals Saionara SandalAeyde Renee Leather Flip-FlopJil Sander Thong SandalTory Burch Leather Platform Flip-FlopKitten Heel Flip-FlopsWant a little height without any discomfort? Reach for a kitten heel option. These styles pair with everything, from Bermuda shorts to linen pants.Neil J. Rodgers Pebble SandalMadewell The Chiara Kitten HeelMango Heeled SandalTony Bianco Krista SandalSteve Madden Allies SandalCushionaire Miami Kitten HeelHigh Heel Flip-FlopsYou can also go all out with sky-high flip-flops created by your favorite designer. The choice is yours.Paris Texas Lorena Thong 100 MuleFerragamo Lyrai Leather SandalAlaïa Thong SandalThe Row Signum Heeled SandalBottega Veneta Marella ThongGia Borghini Lara Leather Thong SandalWhy Trust ELLEEvery product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. html:
Flip-flops were once reserved for the beach or lounging by the pool. But now, the slip-on-and-go staple has become a bona fide fashion essential, thanks to modern upgrades that make them look chicer than ever. From the latest square-toe details on a classic pair of Havaianas to a studded strap on Balenciaga slides, the latest designs turn the timeless sandal into a style-forward must-have.

Even better, today’s flip-flops don’t feel like an afterthought. The new crop is polished enough to wear to a fancy brunch or even a summer wedding. Just ask Kendall Jenner, who’s been spotted wearing sculptural stiletto flip-flops by Alaïa with a celebration-worthy dress in her latest FWRD campaign. Zoë Kravitz has also been a fan, often pairing barely-there thong sandals with loose trousers or oversize shirting in true downtown style star form.

Fashion insiders are co-signing the look too. Street style at the Copenhagen and Paris shows revealed a wave of editors styling flip-flops with maxi skirts, tailored vests, and even eveningwear. The effortless contrast delivers the kind of easy-going elegance typically found on the French Riviera.

Of course, nothing in fashion is ever entirely “new.” Nostalgic references are fueling the flip-flop revival as well. Carolyn Bessette-Kennedy famously wore them in SoHo in the ’90s, giving the ultra-minimal shoe a polished, off-duty vibe that still resonates. Today’s versions echo that ease—but with a luxury twist.

No matter the event on your calendar, flip-flops are the ultimate dependable hero to slip into this summer—and with the right styling, they might just be the chicest choice you make.

Discover the best-in-category flip-flops to shop in our curated selection below.

Flat Flip-Flops

Nothing beats a flip-flop that has withstood the test of time. You can never go wrong with tried-and-true styles by Tkees or a beloved Tory Burch flip-flop.

Havaianas Slim Square Sandal

Veronica Beard Clea Flip-Flop

Proenza Schouler Cable Thong Sandals

Tory Burch Kira Padded Flip-Flop

Tkees Foundations Matte Flip-Flop

Gucci Minorca Horsebit Rubber Sandal

Studded Flip-Flops

The best micro-trend to try within this category is the studded flip-flop. Whether you gravitate towards grommets or bulbous beads, this flashy take will make your vacation outfits feel festive.

Arezzo Sunny Flip-Flop

H&M Studded Flip-Flop

Balenciaga Cagole Studded Flip-Flop

Zara Thong Leather Sandals

Mango Grommet Flip-Flop

Tory Burch Miller Flip-Flop

Leather Flip-Flops

The easiest way to elevate the humble flip-flop is with quality materials—like the leather straps on these coveted styles.

A.Emery Kinto Sandals

The Row Ginza Flip-Flop

Ancient Greek Sandals Saionara Sandal

Aeyde Renee Leather Flip-Flop

Jil Sander Thong Sandal

Tory Burch Leather Platform Flip-Flop

Kitten Heel Flip-Flops

Want a little height without any discomfort? Reach for a kitten heel option. These styles pair with everything, from Bermuda shorts to linen pants.

Neil J. Rodgers Pebble Sandal

Madewell The Chiara Kitten Heel

Mango Heeled Sandal

Tony Bianco Krista Sandal

Steve Madden Allies Sandal

Cushionaire Miami Kitten Heel

High Heel Flip-Flops

You can also go all out with sky-high flip-flops created by your favorite designer. The choice is yours.

Paris Texas Lorena Thong 100 Mule

Ferragamo Lyrai Leather Sandal

Alaïa Thong Sandal

The Row Signum Heeled Sandal

Bottega Veneta Marella Thong

Gia Borghini Lara Leather Thong Sandal

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
